text: <@U0HP6TFNX> i had a good friend of mine (and current cd for ladies' night <http://ladiespdx.com/>) reach out to me and say that she submitted her resume/portfolio for our ux need. her name is aimée reed. i haven't worked with her on ux stuff, but i can speak to her attitude and personality. she's an incredibly hard worker who loves advocating for people who need design the most: our users. i'm interested to see what you think of her professional work since i haven't seen it.

attachments.title: Ladies' Night
attachments.text: Ladies’ Night is a quarterly happy hour for the digitally-minded women, committed to conversation, collaboration, and community.

text: Thank you! We'll make sure to reach out to her.
